# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyd
*.pyo
*.egg-info/
.pytest_cache/

# Virtual environment
.venv/
venv/
env/
# These are common names for virtual environment folders, add any you use.

# Editor specific files
.vscode/ # VS Code settings
.idea/   # PyCharm/IntelliJ IDEA settings

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs and databases
*.log
*.sqlite3
*.db.sqlite3

# Environment variables (e.g., for API keys)
.env
